PRICEBOOK_ID.description: The unique identifier of the pricebook.

DESCRIPTION.description: A brief description of the pricebook.

CURRENCY_CODE.description: The currency code used for prices in the pricebook.

IS_STANDARD.description: Indicates if the pricebook is a standard pricebook or not.

ACTIVE.description: Indicates if the pricebook is currently active or not.

OWNER_USER_ID.description: The ID of the user who owns the pricebook.

CREATED_USER_ID.description: The ID of the user who created the pricebook.

DATE_CREATED_UTC.description: The date and time when the pricebook was created.

DATE_UPDATED_UTC.description: The date and time when the pricebook was last updated.
